name: Honey
description: Pure natural honey, rich in flavor and nutrients. Perfect for daily consumption or as a sweetener.

name: Besar
description: Fine, high-quality turmeric powder (Besar) ideal for cooking, health drinks, and traditional remedies.

name: Sakhar
description: Refined sugar, ideal for cooking, baking, and beverages. Sweetens your recipes naturally.

name: Pickle (Aachar)
description: Traditional homemade pickle with authentic spices. Adds a tangy flavor to meals.

name: Satu
description: Nutritious roasted barley flour (Satu), perfect for drinks, porridge, and healthy snacks.

name: Maize Rice
description: Premium maize rice, rich in fiber and nutrients. Ideal for everyday meals and traditional dishes.

name: Kodo ko pitho
description: Organic finger millet flour (Kodo), perfect for healthy porridge, baking, and local recipes.

name: Phapar ko pitho
description: Buckwheat flour (Phapar) suitable for pancakes, rotis, and nutritious meals. Gluten-free options.
